Detailed Description

template<class Tx, class Tad>
class ReconstructionSecondOrder< Tx, Tad >

Second order reconstruction.

Simple second order reconstruction.

Member Function Documentation

template<class Tx , class Tad >
void ReconstructionSecondOrder< Tx, Tad >::evaluate_chi ( const Array2D< const Tad > &  q,
Array2D< Tad > &  ql,
Array2D< Tad > &  qr 
)
virtual

Reconstruct left and right state for all the chi direction faces.

Parameters
[in]qcell centered variable, includes ghost points. size: (nic + nhalo) x (njc + nhalo)
[out]qlreconstructed left state. size: ni x njc
[out]qrreconstructed right state. size: ni x njc

Reimplemented from Reconstruction< Tx, Tad >.

Array2D< Tad > &  qr

virtual

Reconstruct left and right state for all the eta direction faces.

Parameters
[in]qcell centered variable, includes ghost points. size: (nic + nhalo) x (njc + nhalo)
[out]qlreconstructed left state. size: nic x nj
[out]qrreconstructed right state. size: nic x nj
